181 typedef uint8_t CheckFlags;
182 #define CHECK_NO_FLAGS 0
183 #define CHECK_IN_MAILBOX (1 << 0)
184 #define CHECK_MSGCOUNT (1 << 1)
185 #define CHECK_VISIBLE (1 << 2)
186 #define CHECK_READONLY (1 << 3)
187 #define CHECK_ATTACH (1 << 4)

197 static bool prereq(struct Context *ctx, struct Menu *menu, CheckFlags checks)
198 {
199  bool result = true;
200 
201  if (checks & (CHECK_MSGCOUNT | CHECK_VISIBLE | CHECK_READONLY))
202  checks |= CHECK_IN_MAILBOX;
203 
204  if ((checks & CHECK_IN_MAILBOX) && (!ctx || !ctx->mailbox))
205  {
206  mutt_error(_("No mailbox is open"));
207  result = false;
208  }
209 
210  if (result && (checks & CHECK_MSGCOUNT) && (ctx->mailbox->msg_count == 0))
211  {
212  mutt_error(_("There are no messages"));
213  result = false;
214  }
215 
216  int index = menu_get_index(menu);
217  if (result && (checks & CHECK_VISIBLE) && (index >= ctx->mailbox->vcount))
218  {
219  mutt_error(_("No visible messages"));
220  result = false;
221  }
222 
223  if (result && (checks & CHECK_READONLY) && ctx->mailbox->readonly)
224  {
225  mutt_error(_("Mailbox is read-only"));
226  result = false;
227  }
228 
229  if (result && (checks & CHECK_ATTACH) && OptAttachMsg)
230  {
231  mutt_error(_("Function not permitted in attach-message mode"));
232  result = false;
233  }
234 
235  if (!result)
236  mutt_flushinp();
237 
238  return result;
239 }

248 static bool check_acl(struct Mailbox *m, AclFlags acl, const char *msg)
249 {
250  if (!m)
251  return false;
252 
253  if (!(m->rights & acl))
254  {
255  /* L10N: %s is one of the CHECK_ACL entries below. */
256  mutt_error(_("%s: Operation not permitted by ACL"), msg);
257  return false;
258  }
259 
260  return true;
261 }

275 static void collapse_all(struct Context *ctx, struct Menu *menu, int toggle)
276 {
277  if (!ctx || !ctx->mailbox || (ctx->mailbox->msg_count == 0) || !menu)
278  return;
279 
280  struct Email *e_cur = mutt_get_virt_email(ctx->mailbox, menu_get_index(menu));
281  if (!e_cur)
282  return;
283 
284  int final;
285 
286  /* Figure out what the current message would be after folding / unfolding,
287  * so that we can restore the cursor in a sane way afterwards. */
288  if (e_cur->collapsed && toggle)
289  final = mutt_uncollapse_thread(e_cur);
290  else if (mutt_thread_can_collapse(e_cur))
291  final = mutt_collapse_thread(e_cur);
292  else
293  final = e_cur->vnum;
294 
295  if (final == -1)
296  return;
297 
298  struct Email *base = mutt_get_virt_email(ctx->mailbox, final);
299  if (!base)
300  return;
301 
302  /* Iterate all threads, perform collapse/uncollapse as needed */
303  ctx->collapsed = toggle ? !ctx->collapsed : true;
304  mutt_thread_collapse(ctx->threads, ctx->collapsed);
305 
306  /* Restore the cursor */
307  mutt_set_vnum(ctx->mailbox);
308  menu->max = ctx->mailbox->vcount;
309  for (int i = 0; i < ctx->mailbox->vcount; i++)
310  {
311  struct Email *e = mutt_get_virt_email(ctx->mailbox, i);
312  if (!e)
313  break;
314  if (e->index == base->index)
315  {
316  menu_set_index(menu, i);
317  break;
318  }
319  }
320 
321  menu_queue_redraw(menu, MENU_REDRAW_INDEX | MENU_REDRAW_STATUS);
322 }

331 static int ci_next_undeleted(struct Mailbox *m, int msgno)
332 {
333  if (!m)
334  return -1;
335 
336  for (int i = msgno + 1; i < m->vcount; i++)
337  {
338  struct Email *e = mutt_get_virt_email(m, i);
339  if (!e)
340  continue;
341  if (!e->deleted)
342  return i;
343  }
344  return -1;
345 }

362  if (!e)

378 static int ci_first_message(struct Mailbox *m)
379 {
380  if (!m || (m->msg_count == 0))
381  return 0;
382 
383  int old = -1;
384  for (int i = 0; i < m->vcount; i++)
385  {
386  struct Email *e = mutt_get_virt_email(m, i);
387  if (!e)
388  continue;
389  if (!e->read && !e->deleted)
390  {
391  if (!e->old)
392  return i;
393  if (old == -1)
394  old = i;
395  }
396  }
397  if (old != -1)
398  return old;
399 
400  /* If `$sort` is reverse and not threaded, the latest message is first.
401  * If `$sort` is threaded, the latest message is first if exactly one
402  * of `$sort` and `$sort_aux` are reverse. */
403  const short c_sort = cs_subset_sort(m->sub, "sort");
404  const short c_sort_aux = cs_subset_sort(m->sub, "sort_aux");
405  if (((c_sort & SORT_REVERSE) && ((c_sort & SORT_MASK) != SORT_THREADS)) ||
406  (((c_sort & SORT_MASK) == SORT_THREADS) && ((c_sort ^ c_sort_aux) & SORT_REVERSE)))
407  {
408  return 0;
409  }
410  else
411  {
412  return m->vcount ? m->vcount - 1 : 0;
413  }
414 
415  return 0;
416 }

426 static int mx_toggle_write(struct Mailbox *m)
427 {
428  if (!m)
429  return -1;
430 
431  if (m->readonly)
432  {
433  mutt_error(_("Can't toggle write on a readonly mailbox"));
434  return -1;
435  }
436 
437  if (m->dontwrite)
438  {
439  m->dontwrite = false;
440  mutt_message(_("Changes to folder will be written on folder exit"));
441  }
442  else
443  {
444  m->dontwrite = true;
445  mutt_message(_("Changes to folder will not be written"));
446  }
447 
448  return 0;
449 }

456 static void resort_index(struct Context *ctx, struct Menu *menu)
457 {
458  if (!ctx || !ctx->mailbox || !menu)
459  return;
460 
461  struct Mailbox *m = ctx->mailbox;
462  const int old_index = menu_get_index(menu);
463  struct Email *e_cur = mutt_get_virt_email(m, old_index);
464 
465  int new_index = -1;
466  mutt_sort_headers(m, ctx->threads, false, &ctx->vsize);
467  /* Restore the current message */
468 
469  for (int i = 0; i < m->vcount; i++)
470  {
471  struct Email *e = mutt_get_virt_email(m, i);
472  if (!e)
473  continue;
474  if (e == e_cur)
475  {
476  new_index = i;
477  break;
478  }
479  }
480 
481  const short c_sort = cs_subset_sort(m->sub, "sort");
482  if (((c_sort & SORT_MASK) == SORT_THREADS) && (old_index < 0))
483  new_index = mutt_parent_message(e_cur, false);
484 
485  if (old_index < 0)
486  new_index = ci_first_message(m);
487 
488  menu_set_index(menu, new_index);
489  menu_queue_redraw(menu, MENU_REDRAW_INDEX | MENU_REDRAW_STATUS);
490 }

498 static void update_index_threaded(struct Context *ctx, enum MxStatus check, int oldcount)
499 {
500  struct Email **save_new = NULL;
501  const bool lmt = ctx_has_limit(ctx);
502 
503  struct Mailbox *m = ctx->mailbox;
504  int num_new = MAX(0, m->msg_count - oldcount);
505 
506  const bool c_uncollapse_new = cs_subset_bool(m->sub, "uncollapse_new");
507  /* save the list of new messages */
508  if ((check != MX_STATUS_REOPENED) && (oldcount > 0) &&
509  (lmt || c_uncollapse_new) && (num_new > 0))
510  {
511  save_new = mutt_mem_malloc(num_new * sizeof(struct Email *));
512  for (int i = oldcount; i < m->msg_count; i++)
513  save_new[i - oldcount] = m->emails[i];
514  }
515 
516  /* Sort first to thread the new messages, because some patterns
517  * require the threading information.
518  *
519  * If the mailbox was reopened, need to rethread from scratch. */
520  mutt_sort_headers(m, ctx->threads, (check == MX_STATUS_REOPENED), &ctx->vsize);
521 
522  if (lmt)
523  {
524  /* Because threading changes the order in m->emails, we don't
525  * know which emails are new. Hence, we need to re-apply the limit to the
526  * whole set.
527  */
528  for (int i = 0; i < m->msg_count; i++)
529  {
530  struct Email *e = m->emails[i];
531  if ((e->vnum != -1) || mutt_pattern_exec(SLIST_FIRST(ctx->limit_pattern),
532  MUTT_MATCH_FULL_ADDRESS, m, e, NULL))
533  {
534  /* vnum will get properly set by mutt_set_vnum(), which
535  * is called by mutt_sort_headers() just below. */
536  e->vnum = 1;
537  e->visible = true;
538  }
539  else
540  {
541  e->vnum = -1;
542  e->visible = false;
543  }
544  }
545  /* Need a second sort to set virtual numbers and redraw the tree */
546  mutt_sort_headers(m, ctx->threads, false, &ctx->vsize);
547  }
548 
549  /* uncollapse threads with new mail */
550  if (c_uncollapse_new)
551  {
552  if (check == MX_STATUS_REOPENED)
553  {
554  ctx->collapsed = false;
555  mutt_thread_collapse(ctx->threads, ctx->collapsed);
556  mutt_set_vnum(m);
557  }
558  else if (oldcount > 0)
559  {
560  for (int j = 0; j < num_new; j++)
561  {
562  if (save_new[j]->visible)
563  {
564  mutt_uncollapse_thread(save_new[j]);
565  }
566  }
567  mutt_set_vnum(m);
568  }
569  }
570 
571  FREE(&save_new);
572 }

579 static void update_index_unthreaded(struct Context *ctx, enum MxStatus check)
580 {
581  /* We are in a limited view. Check if the new message(s) satisfy
582  * the limit criteria. If they do, set their virtual msgno so that
583  * they will be visible in the limited view */
584  if (ctx_has_limit(ctx))
585  {
586  int padding = mx_msg_padding_size(ctx->mailbox);
587  ctx->mailbox->vcount = ctx->vsize = 0;
588  for (int i = 0; i < ctx->mailbox->msg_count; i++)
589  {
590  struct Email *e = ctx->mailbox->emails[i];
591  if (!e)
592  break;
593  if (mutt_pattern_exec(SLIST_FIRST(ctx->limit_pattern),
594  MUTT_MATCH_FULL_ADDRESS, ctx->mailbox, e, NULL))
595  {
596  assert(ctx->mailbox->vcount < ctx->mailbox->msg_count);
597  e->vnum = ctx->mailbox->vcount;
598  ctx->mailbox->v2r[ctx->mailbox->vcount] = i;
599  e->visible = true;
600  ctx->mailbox->vcount++;
601  struct Body *b = e->body;
602  ctx->vsize += b->length + b->offset - b->hdr_offset + padding;
603  }
604  else
605  {
606  e->visible = false;
607  }
608  }
609  }
610 
611  /* if the mailbox was reopened, need to rethread from scratch */
612  mutt_sort_headers(ctx->mailbox, ctx->threads, (check == MX_STATUS_REOPENED), &ctx->vsize);
613 }

623 static void update_index(struct Menu *menu, struct Context *ctx, enum MxStatus check,
624  int oldcount, const struct IndexSharedData *shared)
625 {
626  if (!menu || !ctx)
627  return;
628 
629  struct Mailbox *m = ctx->mailbox;
630  const short c_sort = cs_subset_sort(m->sub, "sort");
631  if ((c_sort & SORT_MASK) == SORT_THREADS)
632  update_index_threaded(ctx, check, oldcount);
633  else
634  update_index_unthreaded(ctx, check);
635 
636  const int old_index = menu_get_index(menu);
637  int index = -1;
638  if (oldcount)
639  {
640  /* restore the current message to the message it was pointing to */
641  for (int i = 0; i < m->vcount; i++)
642  {
643  struct Email *e = mutt_get_virt_email(m, i);
644  if (!e)
645  continue;
646  if (index_shared_data_is_cur_email(shared, e))
647  {
648  index = i;
649  break;
650  }
651  }
652  }
653 
654  if (index < 0)
655  {
656  index = (old_index < m->vcount) ? old_index : ci_first_message(m);
657  }
658  menu_set_index(menu, index);
659 }
660 
669 void mutt_update_index(struct Menu *menu, struct Context *ctx, enum MxStatus check,
670  int oldcount, struct IndexSharedData *shared)
671 {
672  update_index(menu, ctx, check, oldcount, shared);
673 }

680 static int index_mailbox_observer(struct NotifyCallback *nc)
681 {
682  if ((nc->event_type != NT_MAILBOX) || !nc->global_data)
683  return -1;
684 
685  if (nc->event_subtype != NT_MAILBOX_DELETE)
686  return 0;
687 
688  struct Mailbox **ptr = nc->global_data;
689  if (!ptr || !*ptr)
690  return 0;
691 
692  *ptr = NULL;
693  mutt_debug(LL_DEBUG5, "mailbox done\n");
694  return 0;
695 }

705 static void change_folder_mailbox(struct Menu *menu, struct Mailbox *m, int *oldcount,
706  struct IndexSharedData *shared, bool read_only)
707 {
708  if (!m)
709  return;
710 
711  /* keepalive failure in mutt_enter_fname may kill connection. */
712  if (shared->mailbox && (mutt_buffer_is_empty(&shared->mailbox->pathbuf)))
713  {
714  ctx_free(&shared->ctx);
715  }
716 
717  if (shared->mailbox)
718  {
719  char *new_last_folder = NULL;
720 #ifdef USE_INOTIFY
721  int monitor_remove_rc = mutt_monitor_remove(NULL);
722 #endif
723 #ifdef USE_COMP_MBOX
724  if (shared->mailbox->compress_info && (shared->mailbox->realpath[0] != '\0'))
725  new_last_folder = mutt_str_dup(shared->mailbox->realpath);
726  else
727 #endif
728  new_last_folder = mutt_str_dup(mailbox_path(shared->mailbox));
729  *oldcount = shared->mailbox->msg_count;
730 
731  const enum MxStatus check = mx_mbox_close(shared->mailbox);
732  if (check == MX_STATUS_OK)
733  {
734  ctx_free(&shared->ctx);
735  }
736  else
737  {
738 #ifdef USE_INOTIFY
739  if (monitor_remove_rc == 0)
740  mutt_monitor_add(NULL);
741 #endif
742  if ((check == MX_STATUS_NEW_MAIL) || (check == MX_STATUS_REOPENED))
743  update_index(menu, shared->ctx, check, *oldcount, shared);
744 
745  FREE(&new_last_folder);
746  OptSearchInvalid = true;
747  menu_queue_redraw(menu, MENU_REDRAW_INDEX | MENU_REDRAW_STATUS);
748  return;
749  }
750  FREE(&LastFolder);
751  LastFolder = new_last_folder;
752  }
753  mutt_str_replace(&CurrentFolder, mailbox_path(m));
754 
755  /* If the `folder-hook` were to call `unmailboxes`, then the Mailbox (`m`)
756  * could be deleted, leaving `m` dangling. */
757  // TODO: Refactor this function to avoid the need for an observer
758  notify_observer_add(m->notify, NT_MAILBOX, index_mailbox_observer, &m);
759  char *dup_path = mutt_str_dup(mailbox_path(m));
760  char *dup_name = mutt_str_dup(m->name);
761 
762  mutt_folder_hook(dup_path, dup_name);
763  if (m)
764  {
765  /* `m` is still valid, but we won't need the observer again before the end
766  * of the function. */
767  notify_observer_remove(m->notify, index_mailbox_observer, &m);
768  }
769 
770  // Recreate the Mailbox as the folder-hook might have invoked `mailboxes`
771  // and/or `unmailboxes`.
772  m = mx_path_resolve(dup_path);
773  FREE(&dup_path);
774  FREE(&dup_name);
775 
776  if (!m)
777  return;
778 
779  const OpenMailboxFlags flags = read_only ? MUTT_READONLY : MUTT_OPEN_NO_FLAGS;
780  if (mx_mbox_open(m, flags))
781  {
782  struct Context *ctx = ctx_new(m);
783  index_shared_data_set_context(shared, ctx);
784 
785  menu_set_index(menu, ci_first_message(shared->mailbox));
786 #ifdef USE_INOTIFY
787  mutt_monitor_add(NULL);
788 #endif
789  }
790  else
791  {
792  index_shared_data_set_context(shared, NULL);
793  menu_set_index(menu, 0);
794  }
795 
796  const short c_sort = cs_subset_sort(shared->sub, "sort");
797  const bool c_collapse_all = cs_subset_bool(shared->sub, "collapse_all");
798  if (((c_sort & SORT_MASK) == SORT_THREADS) && c_collapse_all)
799  collapse_all(shared->ctx, menu, 0);
800 
801  struct MuttWindow *dlg = dialog_find(menu->win_index);
802  struct EventMailbox ev_m = { shared->mailbox };
803  mutt_debug(LL_NOTIFY, "NT_MAILBOX_SWITCH: %p\n", shared->mailbox);
804  notify_send(dlg->notify, NT_MAILBOX, NT_MAILBOX_SWITCH, &ev_m);
805 
806  mutt_clear_error();
807  /* force the mailbox check after we have changed the folder */
808  mutt_mailbox_check(ev_m.mailbox, MUTT_MAILBOX_CHECK_FORCE);
809  menu_queue_redraw(menu, MENU_REDRAW_FULL);
810  OptSearchInvalid = true;
811 }

823 static struct Mailbox *change_folder_notmuch(struct Menu *menu, char *buf,
824  int buflen, int *oldcount,
825  struct IndexSharedData *shared, bool read_only)

829  mutt_message(_("Failed to create query, aborting"));

831  }

849 static void change_folder_string(struct Menu *menu, char *buf, size_t buflen,
850  int *oldcount, struct IndexSharedData *shared,
851  bool *pager_return, bool read_only)
852 {
853 #ifdef USE_NNTP
854  if (OptNews)
855  {
856  OptNews = false;
857  nntp_expand_path(buf, buflen, &CurrentNewsSrv->conn->account);
858  }
859  else
860 #endif
861  {
862  const char *const c_folder = cs_subset_string(shared->sub, "folder");
863  mx_path_canon(buf, buflen, c_folder, NULL);
864  }
865 
866  enum MailboxType type = mx_path_probe(buf);
867  if ((type == MUTT_MAILBOX_ERROR) || (type == MUTT_UNKNOWN))
868  {
869  // Look for a Mailbox by its description, before failing
870  struct Mailbox *m = mailbox_find_name(buf);
871  if (m)
872  {
873  change_folder_mailbox(menu, m, oldcount, shared, read_only);
874  *pager_return = false;
875  }
876  else
877  mutt_error(_("%s is not a mailbox"), buf);
878  return;
879  }
880 
881  /* past this point, we don't return to the pager on error */
882  *pager_return = false;
883 
884  struct Mailbox *m = mx_path_resolve(buf);
885  change_folder_mailbox(menu, m, oldcount, shared, read_only);
886 }
887 
891 void index_make_entry(struct Menu *menu, char *buf, size_t buflen, int line)
892 {
893  buf[0] = '\0';
894 
895  struct IndexPrivateData *priv = menu->mdata;
896  struct IndexSharedData *shared = priv->shared;
897  struct Mailbox *m = shared->mailbox;
898 
899  if (!m || !menu || (line < 0) || (line >= m->email_max))
900  return;
901 
902  struct Email *e = mutt_get_virt_email(m, line);
903  if (!e)
904  return;
905 
906  MuttFormatFlags flags = MUTT_FORMAT_ARROWCURSOR | MUTT_FORMAT_INDEX;
907  struct MuttThread *tmp = NULL;
908 
909  const short c_sort = cs_subset_sort(shared->sub, "sort");
910  if (((c_sort & SORT_MASK) == SORT_THREADS) && e->tree)
911  {
912  flags |= MUTT_FORMAT_TREE; /* display the thread tree */
913  if (e->display_subject)
914  flags |= MUTT_FORMAT_FORCESUBJ;
915  else
916  {
917  const int reverse = c_sort & SORT_REVERSE;
918  int edgemsgno;
919  if (reverse)
920  {
921  if (menu->top + menu->pagelen > menu->max)
922  edgemsgno = m->v2r[menu->max - 1];
923  else
924  edgemsgno = m->v2r[menu->top + menu->pagelen - 1];
925  }
926  else
927  edgemsgno = m->v2r[menu->top];
928 
929  for (tmp = e->thread->parent; tmp; tmp = tmp->parent)
930  {
931  if (!tmp->message)
932  continue;
933 
934  /* if no ancestor is visible on current screen, provisionally force
935  * subject... */
936  if (reverse ? (tmp->message->msgno > edgemsgno) : (tmp->message->msgno < edgemsgno))
937  {
938  flags |= MUTT_FORMAT_FORCESUBJ;
939  break;
940  }
941  else if (tmp->message->vnum >= 0)
942  break;
943  }
944  if (flags & MUTT_FORMAT_FORCESUBJ)
945  {
946  for (tmp = e->thread->prev; tmp; tmp = tmp->prev)
947  {
948  if (!tmp->message)
949  continue;
950 
951  /* ...but if a previous sibling is available, don't force it */
952  if (reverse ? (tmp->message->msgno > edgemsgno) : (tmp->message->msgno < edgemsgno))
953  break;
954  else if (tmp->message->vnum >= 0)
955  {
956  flags &= ~MUTT_FORMAT_FORCESUBJ;
957  break;
958  }
959  }
960  }
961  }
962  }
963 
964  const char *const c_index_format =
965  cs_subset_string(shared->sub, "index_format");
966  mutt_make_string(buf, buflen, menu->win_index->state.cols, NONULL(c_index_format),
967  m, shared->ctx->msg_in_pager, e, flags, NULL);
968 }
969 
973 int index_color(struct Menu *menu, int line)
974 {
975  struct IndexPrivateData *priv = menu->mdata;
976  struct IndexSharedData *shared = priv->shared;
977  struct Mailbox *m = shared->mailbox;
978  if (!m || (line < 0))
979  return 0;
980 
981  struct Email *e = mutt_get_virt_email(m, line);
982  if (!e)
983  return 0;
984 
985  if (e->pair)
986  return e->pair;
987 
988  mutt_set_header_color(m, e);
989  return e->pair;
990 }
991 
1005 void mutt_draw_statusline(struct MuttWindow *win, int cols, const char *buf, size_t buflen)
1006 {
1007  if (!buf || !stdscr)
1008  return;
1009 
1010  size_t i = 0;
1011  size_t offset = 0;
1012  bool found = false;
1013  size_t chunks = 0;
1014  size_t len = 0;
1015 
1016  struct StatusSyntax
1017  {
1018  int color;
1019  int first;
1020  int last;
1021  } *syntax = NULL;
1022 
1023  do
1024  {
1025  struct ColorLine *cl = NULL;
1026  found = false;
1027 
1028  if (!buf[offset])
1029  break;
1030 
1031  /* loop through each "color status regex" */
1032  STAILQ_FOREACH(cl, mutt_color_status_line(), entries)
1033  {
1034  regmatch_t pmatch[cl->match + 1];
1035 
1036  if (regexec(&cl->regex, buf + offset, cl->match + 1, pmatch, 0) != 0)
1037  continue; /* regex doesn't match the status bar */
1038 
1039  int first = pmatch[cl->match].rm_so + offset;
1040  int last = pmatch[cl->match].rm_eo + offset;
1041 
1042  if (first == last)
1043  continue; /* ignore an empty regex */
1044 
1045  if (!found)
1046  {
1047  chunks++;
1048  mutt_mem_realloc(&syntax, chunks * sizeof(struct StatusSyntax));
1049  }
1050 
1051  i = chunks - 1;
1052  if (!found || (first < syntax[i].first) ||
1053  ((first == syntax[i].first) && (last > syntax[i].last)))
1054  {
1055  syntax[i].color = cl->pair;
1056  syntax[i].first = first;
1057  syntax[i].last = last;
1058  }
1059  found = true;
1060  }
1061 
1062  if (syntax)
1063  {
1064  offset = syntax[i].last;
1065  }
1066  } while (found);
1067 
1068  /* Only 'len' bytes will fit into 'cols' screen columns */
1069  len = mutt_wstr_trunc(buf, buflen, cols, NULL);
1070 
1071  offset = 0;
1072 
1073  if ((chunks > 0) && (syntax[0].first > 0))
1074  {
1075  /* Text before the first highlight */
1076  mutt_window_addnstr(win, buf, MIN(len, syntax[0].first));
1077  attrset(mutt_color(MT_COLOR_STATUS));
1078  if (len <= syntax[0].first)
1079  goto dsl_finish; /* no more room */
1080 
1081  offset = syntax[0].first;
1082  }
1083 
1084  for (i = 0; i < chunks; i++)
1085  {
1086  /* Highlighted text */
1087  attrset(syntax[i].color);
1088  mutt_window_addnstr(win, buf + offset, MIN(len, syntax[i].last) - offset);
1089  if (len <= syntax[i].last)
1090  goto dsl_finish; /* no more room */
1091 
1092  size_t next;
1093  if ((i + 1) == chunks)
1094  {
1095  next = len;
1096  }
1097  else
1098  {
1099  next = MIN(len, syntax[i + 1].first);
1100  }
1101 
1102  attrset(mutt_color(MT_COLOR_STATUS));
1103  offset = syntax[i].last;
1104  mutt_window_addnstr(win, buf + offset, next - offset);
1105 
1106  offset = next;
1107  if (offset >= len)
1108  goto dsl_finish; /* no more room */
1109  }
1110 
1111  attrset(mutt_color(MT_COLOR_STATUS));
1112  if (offset < len)
1113  {
1114  /* Text after the last highlight */
1115  mutt_window_addnstr(win, buf + offset, len - offset);
1116  }
1117 
1118  int width = mutt_strwidth(buf);
1119  if (width < cols)
1120  {
1121  /* Pad the rest of the line with whitespace */
1122  mutt_paddstr(win, cols - width, "");
1123  }
1124 dsl_finish:
1125  FREE(&syntax);
1126 }
1127 
1131 static void index_custom_redraw(struct Menu *menu)
1132 {
1133  if (menu->redraw & MENU_REDRAW_FULL)
1134  menu_redraw_full(menu);
1135 
1136  struct IndexPrivateData *priv = menu->mdata;
1137  struct IndexSharedData *shared = priv->shared;
1138  struct Mailbox *m = shared->mailbox;
1139  const int index = menu_get_index(menu);
1140  if (m && m->emails && (index < m->vcount))
1141  {
1142  menu_check_recenter(menu);
1143 
1144  if (menu->redraw & MENU_REDRAW_INDEX)
1145  {
1146  menu_redraw_index(menu);
1147  }
1148  else if (menu->redraw & MENU_REDRAW_MOTION)
1149  menu_redraw_motion(menu);
1150  else if (menu->redraw & MENU_REDRAW_CURRENT)
1151  menu_redraw_current(menu);
1152  }
1153 
1154  menu->redraw = MENU_REDRAW_NO_FLAGS;
1155  mutt_debug(LL_DEBUG5, "repaint done\n");
1156 }
1157 
1167 struct Mailbox *mutt_index_menu(struct MuttWindow *dlg, struct Mailbox *m_init)
1168 {
1169  struct Context *ctx_old = Context;
1170  struct IndexSharedData *shared = dlg->wdata;
1171  index_shared_data_set_context(shared, ctx_new(m_init));
1172 
1173  struct MuttWindow *panel_index = window_find_child(dlg, WT_INDEX);
1174  struct MuttWindow *panel_pager = window_find_child(dlg, WT_PAGER);
1175 
1176  struct IndexPrivateData *priv = panel_index->wdata;
1177  priv->attach_msg = OptAttachMsg;
1178  priv->win_index = window_find_child(panel_index, WT_MENU);
1179  priv->win_ibar = window_find_child(panel_index, WT_STATUS_BAR);
1180  priv->win_pager = window_find_child(panel_pager, WT_CUSTOM);
1181  priv->win_pbar = window_find_child(panel_pager, WT_STATUS_BAR);
1182 
1183  int op = OP_NULL;
1184 
1185 #ifdef USE_NNTP
1186  if (shared->mailbox && (shared->mailbox->type == MUTT_NNTP))
1187  dlg->help_data = IndexNewsHelp;
1188  else
1189 #endif
1190  dlg->help_data = IndexHelp;
1191  dlg->help_menu = MENU_MAIN;
1192 
1193  priv->menu = priv->win_index->wdata;
1194  priv->menu->make_entry = index_make_entry;
1195  priv->menu->color = index_color;
1196  priv->menu->custom_redraw = index_custom_redraw;
1197  priv->menu->max = shared->mailbox ? shared->mailbox->vcount : 0;
1198  menu_set_index(priv->menu, ci_first_message(shared->mailbox));
1199  mutt_window_reflow(NULL);
1200 
1201  if (!priv->attach_msg)
1202  {
1203  /* force the mailbox check after we enter the folder */
1204  mutt_mailbox_check(shared->mailbox, MUTT_MAILBOX_CHECK_FORCE);
1205  }
1206 #ifdef USE_INOTIFY
1207  mutt_monitor_add(NULL);
1208 #endif
1209 
1210  {
1211  const short c_sort = cs_subset_sort(shared->sub, "sort");
1212  const bool c_collapse_all = cs_subset_bool(shared->sub, "collapse_all");
1213  if (((c_sort & SORT_MASK) == SORT_THREADS) && c_collapse_all)
1214  {
1215  collapse_all(shared->ctx, priv->menu, 0);
1216  menu_queue_redraw(priv->menu, MENU_REDRAW_FULL);
1217  }
1218  }
1219 
1220  while (true)
1221  {
1222  /* Clear the tag prefix unless we just started it. Don't clear
1223  * the prefix on a timeout (op==-2), but do clear on an abort (op==-1) */
1224  if (priv->tag && (op != OP_TAG_PREFIX) && (op != OP_TAG_PREFIX_COND) && (op != -2))
1225  priv->tag = false;
1226 
1227  /* check if we need to resort the index because just about
1228  * any 'op' below could do mutt_enter_command(), either here or
1229  * from any new priv->menu launched, and change $sort/$sort_aux */
1230  if (OptNeedResort && shared->mailbox && (shared->mailbox->msg_count != 0) &&
1231  (menu_get_index(priv->menu) >= 0))
1232  {
1233  resort_index(shared->ctx, priv->menu);
1234  }
1235 
1236  priv->menu->max = shared->mailbox ? shared->mailbox->vcount : 0;
1237  priv->oldcount = shared->mailbox ? shared->mailbox->msg_count : 0;
1238 
1239  {
1240  const short c_sort = cs_subset_sort(shared->sub, "sort");
1241  if (OptRedrawTree && shared->mailbox && (shared->mailbox->msg_count != 0) &&
1242  ((c_sort & SORT_MASK) == SORT_THREADS))
1243  {
1244  mutt_draw_tree(shared->ctx->threads);
1245  menu_queue_redraw(priv->menu, MENU_REDRAW_STATUS);
1246  OptRedrawTree = false;
1247  }
1248  }
1249 
1250  if (shared->mailbox)
1251  {
1252  mailbox_gc_run();
1253 
1254  shared->ctx->menu = priv->menu;
1255  /* check for new mail in the mailbox. If nonzero, then something has
1256  * changed about the file (either we got new mail or the file was
1257  * modified underneath us.) */
1258  enum MxStatus check = mx_mbox_check(shared->mailbox);
1259 
1260  if (check == MX_STATUS_ERROR)
1261  {
1262  if (mutt_buffer_is_empty(&shared->mailbox->pathbuf))
1263  {
1264  /* fatal error occurred */
1265  ctx_free(&shared->ctx);
1266  menu_queue_redraw(priv->menu, MENU_REDRAW_FULL);
1267  }
1268 
1269  OptSearchInvalid = true;
1270  }
1271  else if ((check == MX_STATUS_NEW_MAIL) || (check == MX_STATUS_REOPENED) ||
1272  (check == MX_STATUS_FLAGS))
1273  {
1274  /* notify the user of new mail */
1275  if (check == MX_STATUS_REOPENED)
1276  {
1277  mutt_error(
1278  _("Mailbox was externally modified. Flags may be wrong."));
1279  }
1280  else if (check == MX_STATUS_NEW_MAIL)
1281  {
1282  for (size_t i = 0; i < shared->mailbox->msg_count; i++)
1283  {
1284  const struct Email *e = shared->mailbox->emails[i];
1285  if (e && !e->read && !e->old)
1286  {
1287  mutt_message(_("New mail in this mailbox"));
1288  const bool c_beep_new = cs_subset_bool(shared->sub, "beep_new");
1289  if (c_beep_new)
1290  mutt_beep(true);
1291  const char *const c_new_mail_command =
1292  cs_subset_string(shared->sub, "new_mail_command");
1293  if (c_new_mail_command)
1294  {
1295  char cmd[1024];
1296  menu_status_line(cmd, sizeof(cmd), shared, priv->menu,
1297  sizeof(cmd), NONULL(c_new_mail_command));
1298  if (mutt_system(cmd) != 0)
1299  mutt_error(_("Error running \"%s\""), cmd);
1300  }
1301  break;
1302  }
1303  }
1304  }
1305  else if (check == MX_STATUS_FLAGS)
1306  {
1307  mutt_message(_("Mailbox was externally modified"));
1308  }
1309 
1310  /* avoid the message being overwritten by mailbox */
1311  priv->do_mailbox_notify = false;
1312 
1313  bool verbose = shared->mailbox->verbose;
1314  shared->mailbox->verbose = false;
1315  update_index(priv->menu, shared->ctx, check, priv->oldcount, shared);
1316  shared->mailbox->verbose = verbose;
1317  priv->menu->max = shared->mailbox->vcount;
1318  menu_queue_redraw(priv->menu, MENU_REDRAW_FULL);
1319  OptSearchInvalid = true;
1320  }
1321 
1322  if (shared->mailbox)
1323  {
1324  index_shared_data_set_email(
1325  shared, mutt_get_virt_email(shared->mailbox, menu_get_index(priv->menu)));
1326  }
1327  }
1328 
1329  if (!priv->attach_msg)
1330  {
1331  /* check for new mail in the incoming folders */
1332  priv->oldcount = priv->newcount;
1333  priv->newcount = mutt_mailbox_check(shared->mailbox, 0);
1334  if (priv->newcount != priv->oldcount)
1335  menu_queue_redraw(priv->menu, MENU_REDRAW_STATUS);
1336  if (priv->do_mailbox_notify)
1337  {
1338  if (mutt_mailbox_notify(shared->mailbox))
1339  {
1340  menu_queue_redraw(priv->menu, MENU_REDRAW_STATUS);
1341  const bool c_beep_new = cs_subset_bool(shared->sub, "beep_new");
1342  if (c_beep_new)
1343  mutt_beep(true);
1344  const char *const c_new_mail_command =
1345  cs_subset_string(shared->sub, "new_mail_command");
1346  if (c_new_mail_command)
1347  {
1348  char cmd[1024];
1349  menu_status_line(cmd, sizeof(cmd), shared, priv->menu, sizeof(cmd),
1350  NONULL(c_new_mail_command));
1351  if (mutt_system(cmd) != 0)
1352  mutt_error(_("Error running \"%s\""), cmd);
1353  }
1354  }
1355  }
1356  else
1357  priv->do_mailbox_notify = true;
1358  }
1359 
1360  if (op >= 0)
1361  mutt_curses_set_cursor(MUTT_CURSOR_INVISIBLE);
1362 
1363  if (priv->in_pager)
1364  {
1365  mutt_curses_set_cursor(MUTT_CURSOR_VISIBLE); /* fallback from the pager */
1366  }
1367  else
1368  {
1369  index_custom_redraw(priv->menu);
1370  window_redraw(NULL);
1371 
1372  /* give visual indication that the next command is a tag- command */
1373  if (priv->tag)
1374  msgwin_set_text(MT_COLOR_NORMAL, "tag-");
1375 
1376  const bool c_arrow_cursor = cs_subset_bool(shared->sub, "arrow_cursor");
1377  const bool c_braille_friendly =
1378  cs_subset_bool(shared->sub, "braille_friendly");
1379  const int index = menu_get_index(priv->menu);
1380  if (c_arrow_cursor)
1381  {
1382  mutt_window_move(priv->menu->win_index, 2, index - priv->menu->top);
1383  }
1384  else if (c_braille_friendly)
1385  {
1386  mutt_window_move(priv->menu->win_index, 0, index - priv->menu->top);
1387  }
1388  else
1389  {
1390  mutt_window_move(priv->menu->win_index, priv->menu->win_index->state.cols - 1,
1391  index - priv->menu->top);
1392  }
1393  mutt_refresh();
1394 
1395  if (SigWinch)
1396  {
1397  SigWinch = false;
1398  mutt_resize_screen();
1399  priv->menu->top = 0; /* so we scroll the right amount */
1400  /* force a real complete redraw. clrtobot() doesn't seem to be able
1401  * to handle every case without this. */
1402  clearok(stdscr, true);
1403  msgwin_clear_text();
1404  continue;
1405  }
1406 
1407  window_redraw(NULL);
1408  op = km_dokey(MENU_MAIN);
1409 
1410  /* either user abort or timeout */
1411  if (op < 0)
1412  {
1413  mutt_timeout_hook();
1414  if (priv->tag)
1415  msgwin_clear_text();
1416  continue;
1417  }
1418 
1419  mutt_debug(LL_DEBUG1, "Got op %s (%d)\n", OpStrings[op][0], op);
1420 
1421  mutt_curses_set_cursor(MUTT_CURSOR_VISIBLE);
1422 
1423  /* special handling for the priv->tag-prefix function */
1424  const bool c_auto_tag = cs_subset_bool(shared->sub, "auto_tag");
1425  if ((op == OP_TAG_PREFIX) || (op == OP_TAG_PREFIX_COND))
1426  {
1427  /* A second priv->tag-prefix command aborts */
1428  if (priv->tag)
1429  {
1430  priv->tag = false;
1431  msgwin_clear_text();
1432  continue;
1433  }
1434 
1435  if (!shared->mailbox)
1436  {
1437  mutt_error(_("No mailbox is open"));
1438  continue;
1439  }
1440 
1441  if (shared->mailbox->msg_tagged == 0)
1442  {
1443  if (op == OP_TAG_PREFIX)
1444  mutt_error(_("No tagged messages"));
1445  else if (op == OP_TAG_PREFIX_COND)
1446  {
1447  mutt_flush_macro_to_endcond();
1448  mutt_message(_("Nothing to do"));
1449  }
1450  continue;
1451  }
1452 
1453  /* get the real command */
1454  priv->tag = true;
1455  continue;
1456  }
1457  else if (c_auto_tag && shared->mailbox && (shared->mailbox->msg_tagged != 0))
1458  {
1459  priv->tag = true;
1460  }
1461 
1462  mutt_clear_error();
1463  }
1464 
1465 #ifdef USE_NNTP
1466  OptNews = false; /* for any case */
1467 #endif
1468 
1469 #ifdef USE_NOTMUCH
1470  nm_db_debug_check(shared->mailbox);
1471 #endif
1472 
1473  switch (op)
1474  {
1475  /* ----------------------------------------------------------------------
1476  * movement commands
1477  */
1478 
1479  case OP_BOTTOM_PAGE:
1480  menu_bottom_page(priv->menu);
1481  break;
1482  case OP_CURRENT_BOTTOM:
1483  menu_current_bottom(priv->menu);
1484  break;
1485  case OP_CURRENT_MIDDLE:
1486  menu_current_middle(priv->menu);
1487  break;
1488  case OP_CURRENT_TOP:
1489  menu_current_top(priv->menu);
1490  break;
1491  case OP_FIRST_ENTRY:
1492  menu_first_entry(priv->menu);
1493  break;
1494  case OP_HALF_DOWN:
1495  menu_half_down(priv->menu);
1496  break;
1497  case OP_HALF_UP:
1498  menu_half_up(priv->menu);
1499  break;
1500  case OP_LAST_ENTRY:
1501  menu_last_entry(priv->menu);
1502  break;
1503  case OP_MIDDLE_PAGE:
1504  menu_middle_page(priv->menu);
1505  break;
1506  case OP_NEXT_LINE:
1507  menu_next_line(priv->menu);
1508  break;
1509  case OP_NEXT_PAGE:
1510  menu_next_page(priv->menu);
1511  break;
1512  case OP_PREV_LINE:
1513  menu_prev_line(priv->menu);
1514  break;
1515  case OP_PREV_PAGE:
1516  menu_prev_page(priv->menu);
1517  break;
1518  case OP_TOP_PAGE:
1519  menu_top_page(priv->menu);
1520  break;
1521 
1522 #ifdef USE_NNTP
1523  case OP_GET_PARENT:
1524  if (!prereq(shared->ctx, priv->menu, CHECK_IN_MAILBOX | CHECK_MSGCOUNT | CHECK_VISIBLE))
1525  break;
1526  /* fallthrough */
1527 
1528  case OP_GET_MESSAGE:
1529  {
1530  if (!prereq(shared->ctx, priv->menu, CHECK_IN_MAILBOX | CHECK_READONLY | CHECK_ATTACH))
1531  break;
1532  char buf[PATH_MAX] = { 0 };
1533  if (shared->mailbox->type == MUTT_NNTP)
1534  {
1535  if (op == OP_GET_MESSAGE)
1536  {
1537  if ((mutt_get_field(_("Enter Message-Id: "), buf, sizeof(buf),
1538  MUTT_COMP_NO_FLAGS, false, NULL, NULL) != 0) ||
1539  (buf[0] == '\0'))
1540  {
1541  break;
1542  }
1543  }
1544  else
1545  {
1546  if (!shared->email || STAILQ_EMPTY(&shared->email->env->references))
1547  {
1548  mutt_error(_("Article has no parent reference"));
1549  break;
1550  }
1551  mutt_str_copy(buf, STAILQ_FIRST(&shared->email->env->references)->data,
1552  sizeof(buf));
1553  }
1554  if (!shared->mailbox->id_hash)
1555  shared->mailbox->id_hash = mutt_make_id_hash(shared->mailbox);
1556  struct Email *e = mutt_hash_find(shared->mailbox->id_hash, buf);
1557  if (e)
1558  {
1559  if (e->vnum != -1)
1560  {
1561  menu_set_index(priv->menu, e->vnum);
1562  }
1563  else if (e->collapsed)
1564  {
1565  mutt_uncollapse_thread(e);
1566  mutt_set_vnum(shared->mailbox);
1567  menu_set_index(priv->menu, e->vnum);
1568  }
1569  else
1570  mutt_error(_("Message is not visible in limited view"));
1571  }
1572  else
1573  {
1574  mutt_message(_("Fetching %s from server..."), buf);
1575  int rc = nntp_check_msgid(shared->mailbox, buf);
1576  if (rc == 0)
1577  {
1578  e = shared->mailbox->emails[shared->mailbox->msg_count - 1];
1579  mutt_sort_headers(shared->mailbox, shared->ctx->threads, false,
1580  &shared->ctx->vsize);
1581  menu_set_index(priv->menu, e->vnum);
1582  menu_queue_redraw(priv->menu, MENU_REDRAW_FULL);
1583  }
1584  else if (rc > 0)
1585  mutt_error(_("Article %s not found on the server"), buf);
1586  }
1587  }
1588  break;
1589  }
1590 
1591  case OP_GET_CHILDREN:
1592  case OP_RECONSTRUCT_THREAD:
1593  {
1594  if (!prereq(shared->ctx, priv->menu,
1595  CHECK_IN_MAILBOX | CHECK_MSGCOUNT | CHECK_VISIBLE | CHECK_READONLY | CHECK_ATTACH))
1596  {
1597  break;
1598  }
1599  if (shared->mailbox->type != MUTT_NNTP)
1600  break;
1601 
1602  if (!shared->email)
1603  break;
1604 
1605  char buf[PATH_MAX] = { 0 };
1606  int oldmsgcount = shared->mailbox->msg_count;
1607  int oldindex = shared->email->index;
1608  int rc = 0;
1609 
1610  if (!shared->email->env->message_id)
1611  {
1612  mutt_error(_("No Message-Id. Unable to perform operation."));
1613  break;
1614  }
1615 
1616  mutt_message(_("Fetching message headers..."));
1617  if (!shared->mailbox->id_hash)
1618  shared->mailbox->id_hash = mutt_make_id_hash(shared->mailbox);
1619  mutt_str_copy(buf, shared->email->env->message_id, sizeof(buf));
1620 
1621  /* trying to find msgid of the root message */
1622  if (op == OP_RECONSTRUCT_THREAD)
1623  {
1624  struct ListNode *ref = NULL;
1625  STAILQ_FOREACH(ref, &shared->email->env->references, entries)
1626  {
1627  if (!mutt_hash_find(shared->mailbox->id_hash, ref->data))
1628  {
1629  rc = nntp_check_msgid(shared->mailbox, ref->data);
1630  if (rc < 0)
1631  break;
1632  }
1633 
1634  /* the last msgid in References is the root message */
1635  if (!STAILQ_NEXT(ref, entries))
1636  mutt_str_copy(buf, ref->data, sizeof(buf));
1637  }
1638  }
1639 
1640  /* fetching all child messages */
1641  if (rc >= 0)
1642  rc = nntp_check_children(shared->mailbox, buf);
1643 
1644  /* at least one message has been loaded */
1645  if (shared->mailbox->msg_count > oldmsgcount)
1646  {
1647  const int index = menu_get_index(priv->menu);
1648  struct Email *e_oldcur = mutt_get_virt_email(shared->mailbox, index);
1649  bool verbose = shared->mailbox->verbose;
1650 
1651  if (rc < 0)
1652  shared->mailbox->verbose = false;
1653  mutt_sort_headers(shared->mailbox, shared->ctx->threads,
1654  (op == OP_RECONSTRUCT_THREAD), &shared->ctx->vsize);
1655  shared->mailbox->verbose = verbose;
1656 
1657  /* Similar to OP_MAIN_ENTIRE_THREAD, keep displaying the old message, but
1658  * update the index */
1659  if (priv->in_pager)
1660  {
1661  menu_set_index(priv->menu, e_oldcur->vnum);
1662  menu_queue_redraw(priv->menu, MENU_REDRAW_STATUS | MENU_REDRAW_INDEX);
1663  op = OP_DISPLAY_MESSAGE;
1664  continue;
1665  }
1666 
1667  /* if the root message was retrieved, move to it */
1668  struct Email *e = mutt_hash_find(shared->mailbox->id_hash, buf);
1669  if (e)
1670  menu_set_index(priv->menu, e->vnum);
1671  else
1672  {
1673  /* try to restore old position */
1674  for (int i = 0; i < shared->mailbox->msg_count; i++)
1675  {
1676  e = shared->mailbox->emails[i];
1677  if (!e)
1678  break;
1679  if (e->index == oldindex)
1680  {
1681  menu_set_index(priv->menu, e->vnum);
1682  /* as an added courtesy, recenter the priv->menu
1683  * with the current entry at the middle of the screen */
1684  menu_check_recenter(priv->menu);
1685  menu_current_middle(priv->menu);
1686  }
1687  }
1688  }
1689  menu_queue_redraw(priv->menu, MENU_REDRAW_FULL);
1690  }
1691  else if (rc >= 0)
1692  {
1693  mutt_error(_("No deleted messages found in the thread"));
1694  /* Similar to OP_MAIN_ENTIRE_THREAD, keep displaying the old message, but
1695  * update the index */
1696  if (priv->in_pager)
1697  {
1698  op = OP_DISPLAY_MESSAGE;
1699  continue;
1700  }
1701  }
1702  break;
1703  }
1704 #endif
1705 
1706  case OP_JUMP:
1707  {
1708  if (!prereq(shared->ctx, priv->menu, CHECK_IN_MAILBOX))
1709  break;
1710  char buf[PATH_MAX] = { 0 };
1711  int msg_num = 0;
1712  if (isdigit(LastKey))
1713  mutt_unget_event(LastKey, 0);
1714  if ((mutt_get_field(_("Jump to message: "), buf, sizeof(buf),
1715  MUTT_COMP_NO_FLAGS, false, NULL, NULL) != 0) ||
1716  (buf[0] == '\0'))
1717  {
1718  mutt_error(_("Nothing to do"));
1719  }
1720  else if (mutt_str_atoi(buf, &msg_num) < 0)
1721  mutt_error(_("Argument must be a message number"));
1722  else if ((msg_num < 1) || (msg_num > shared->mailbox->msg_count))
1723  mutt_error(_("Invalid message number"));
1724  else if (!shared->mailbox->emails[msg_num - 1]->visible)
1725  mutt_error(_("That message is not visible"));
1726  else
1727  {
1728  struct Email *e = shared->mailbox->emails[msg_num - 1];
1729 
1730  if (mutt_messages_in_thread(shared->mailbox, e, MIT_POSITION) > 1)
1731  {
1732  mutt_uncollapse_thread(e);
1733  mutt_set_vnum(shared->mailbox);
1734  }
1735  menu_set_index(priv->menu, e->vnum);
1736  }
1737 
1738  if (priv->in_pager)
1739  {
1740  op = OP_DISPLAY_MESSAGE;
1741  continue;
1742  }
1743  else
1744  menu_queue_redraw(priv->menu, MENU_REDRAW_FULL);
1745 
1746  break;
1747  }
1748

1750  * 'index' specific commands
1751  */
1752 
1753  case OP_MAIN_DELETE_PATTERN:
1754  if (!prereq(shared->ctx, priv->menu, CHECK_IN_MAILBOX | CHECK_READONLY | CHECK_ATTACH))
1755  {
1756  break;
1757  }
1758  /* L10N: CHECK_ACL */
1759  /* L10N: Due to the implementation details we do not know whether we
1760  delete zero, 1, 12, ... messages. So in English we use
1761  "messages". Your language might have other means to express this. */
1762  if (!check_acl(shared->mailbox, MUTT_ACL_DELETE, _("Can't delete messages")))
1763  break;

1766  menu_queue_redraw(priv->menu, MENU_REDRAW_INDEX | MENU_REDRAW_STATUS);

1815  if (!prereq(shared->ctx, priv->menu, CHECK_IN_MAILBOX))
1816  break;
1817  if (!ctx_has_limit(shared->ctx))
1818  mutt_message(_("No limit pattern is in effect"));
1819  else
1820  {
1821  char buf2[256];
1822  /* L10N: ask for a limit to apply */
1823  snprintf(buf2, sizeof(buf2), _("Limit: %s"), shared->ctx->pattern);
1824  mutt_message("%s", buf2);
1825  }
1826  break;
1827 
1828  case OP_LIMIT_CURRENT_THREAD:
1829  case OP_MAIN_LIMIT:
1830  case OP_TOGGLE_READ:
1831  {
1832  if (!prereq(shared->ctx, priv->menu, CHECK_IN_MAILBOX))
1833  break;
1834  const bool lmt = ctx_has_limit(shared->ctx);
1835  int old_index = shared->email ? shared->email->index : -1;
1836  if (op == OP_TOGGLE_READ)
1837  {
1838  char buf2[1024];
1839 
1840  if (!lmt || !mutt_strn_equal(shared->ctx->pattern, "!~R!~D~s", 8))
1841  {
1842  snprintf(buf2, sizeof(buf2), "!~R!~D~s%s", lmt ? shared->ctx->pattern : ".*");
1843  }
1844  else
1845  {
1846  mutt_str_copy(buf2, shared->ctx->pattern + 8, sizeof(buf2));
1847  if ((*buf2 == '\0') || mutt_strn_equal(buf2, ".*", 2))
1848  snprintf(buf2, sizeof(buf2), "~A");
1849  }
1850  mutt_str_replace(&shared->ctx->pattern, buf2);
1851  mutt_pattern_func(shared->ctx, MUTT_LIMIT, NULL);
1852  }
1853 
1854  if (((op == OP_LIMIT_CURRENT_THREAD) &&
1855  mutt_limit_current_thread(shared->ctx, shared->email)) ||
1856  (op == OP_TOGGLE_READ) ||
1857  ((op == OP_MAIN_LIMIT) &&
1858  (mutt_pattern_func(shared->ctx, MUTT_LIMIT, _("Limit to messages matching: ")) == 0)))
1859  {
1860  int index = 0;
1861  if (old_index >= 0)
1862  {
1863  /* try to find what used to be the current message */
1864  for (size_t i = 0; i < shared->mailbox->vcount; i++)
1865  {
1866  struct Email *e = mutt_get_virt_email(shared->mailbox, i);
1867  if (!e)
1868  continue;
1869  if (e->index == old_index)
1870  {
1871  index = i;
1872  break;
1873  }
1874  }
1875  }
1876  menu_set_index(priv->menu, index);
1877 
1878  const short c_sort = cs_subset_sort(shared->sub, "sort");
1879  if ((shared->mailbox->msg_count != 0) && ((c_sort & SORT_MASK) == SORT_THREADS))
1880  {
1881  const bool c_collapse_all =
1882  cs_subset_bool(shared->sub, "collapse_all");
1883  if (c_collapse_all)
1884  collapse_all(shared->ctx, priv->menu, 0);
1885  mutt_draw_tree(shared->ctx->threads);
1886  }
1887  menu_queue_redraw(priv->menu, MENU_REDRAW_FULL);
1888  }
1889  if (lmt)
1890  mutt_message(_("To view all messages, limit to \"all\""));
1891  break;
1892  }
1893 
1894  case OP_QUIT:
1895  {
1896  if (priv->attach_msg)
1897  {
1898  priv->done = true;
1899  break;
1900  }
1901 
1902  const enum QuadOption c_quit = cs_subset_quad(shared->sub, "quit");
1903  if (query_quadoption(c_quit, _("Quit NeoMutt?")) == MUTT_YES)
1904  {
1905  priv->oldcount = shared->mailbox ? shared->mailbox->msg_count : 0;
1906 
1907  mutt_startup_shutdown_hook(MUTT_SHUTDOWN_HOOK);
1908  mutt_debug(LL_NOTIFY, "NT_GLOBAL_SHUTDOWN\n");
1909  notify_send(NeoMutt->notify, NT_GLOBAL, NT_GLOBAL_SHUTDOWN, NULL);

1911  enum MxStatus check = MX_STATUS_OK;
1912  if (!shared->ctx || ((check = mx_mbox_close(shared->mailbox)) == MX_STATUS_OK))
1913  {
1914  ctx_free(&shared->ctx);
1915  priv->done = true;
1916  }
1917  else
1918  {
1919  if ((check == MX_STATUS_NEW_MAIL) || (check == MX_STATUS_REOPENED))
1920  {
1921  update_index(priv->menu, shared->ctx, check, priv->oldcount, shared);
1922  }
1923 
1924  menu_queue_redraw(priv->menu, MENU_REDRAW_FULL); /* new mail arrived? */
1925  OptSearchInvalid = true;
1926  }
1927  }
1928  break;

1934  menu_queue_redraw(priv->menu, MENU_REDRAW_FULL);
1935  break;
1936 
1937  // Initiating a search can happen on an empty mailbox, but
1938  // searching for next/previous/... needs to be on a message and
1939  // thus a non-empty mailbox
1940  case OP_SEARCH_REVERSE:
1941  case OP_SEARCH_NEXT:
1942  case OP_SEARCH_OPPOSITE:
1943  if (!prereq(shared->ctx, priv->menu, CHECK_IN_MAILBOX | CHECK_MSGCOUNT | CHECK_VISIBLE))
1944  break;
1945  /* fallthrough */
1946  case OP_SEARCH:

1948  if (!prereq(shared->ctx, priv->menu, CHECK_IN_MAILBOX))

1951  index = mutt_search_command(shared->mailbox, priv->menu, index, op);
1952  if (index != -1)
1953  menu_set_index(priv->menu, index);
1954  else
1955  menu_queue_redraw(priv->menu, MENU_REDRAW_MOTION);

1960  case OP_SORT_REVERSE:

1962  break;

1965  {

1968  }

1972  continue;
1973  }
1974  menu_queue_redraw(priv->menu, MENU_REDRAW_STATUS);
1975  break;
1976 
1977  case OP_TAG:
1978  {
1979  if (!prereq(shared->ctx, priv->menu, CHECK_IN_MAILBOX | CHECK_MSGCOUNT | CHECK_VISIBLE))
1980  break;
1981  const bool c_auto_tag = cs_subset_bool(shared->sub, "auto_tag");
1982  if (priv->tag && !c_auto_tag)
1983  {
1984  struct Mailbox *m = shared->mailbox;
1985  for (size_t i = 0; i < m->msg_count; i++)
1986  {
1987  struct Email *e = m->emails[i];
1988  if (!e)
1989  break;
1990  if (e->visible)
1991  mutt_set_flag(m, e, MUTT_TAG, false);
1992  }
1993  menu_queue_redraw(priv->menu, MENU_REDRAW_STATUS | MENU_REDRAW_INDEX);
1994  }
1995  else
1996  {
1997  if (!shared->email)
1998  break;
1999  mutt_set_flag(shared->mailbox, shared->email, MUTT_TAG, !shared->email->tagged);
2000 
2001  menu_queue_redraw(priv->menu, MENU_REDRAW_STATUS);
2002  const bool c_resolve = cs_subset_bool(shared->sub, "resolve");
2003  const int index = menu_get_index(priv->menu) + 1;
2004  if (c_resolve && (index < shared->mailbox->vcount))
2005  {
2006  menu_set_index(priv->menu, index);
2007  }
2008  else
2009  menu_queue_redraw(priv->menu, MENU_REDRAW_CURRENT);
2010  }
2011  break;
2012  }
2013

2097  case OP_MAIN_SYNC_FOLDER:
2098  if (!shared->mailbox || (shared->mailbox->msg_count == 0))
2099  break;
2100 
2101  if (!prereq(shared->ctx, priv->menu, CHECK_IN_MAILBOX | CHECK_MSGCOUNT | CHECK_READONLY))
2102  break;
2103  {
2104  int ovc = shared->mailbox->vcount;
2105  int oc = shared->mailbox->msg_count;
2106  struct Email *e = NULL;
2107 
2108  /* don't attempt to move the cursor if there are no visible messages in the current limit */
2109  int index = menu_get_index(priv->menu);
2110  if (index < shared->mailbox->vcount)
2111  {
2112  /* threads may be reordered, so figure out what header the cursor
2113  * should be on. */
2114  int newidx = index;
2115  if (!shared->email)
2116  break;
2117  if (shared->email->deleted)
2118  newidx = ci_next_undeleted(shared->mailbox, index);
2119  if (newidx < 0)
2120  newidx = ci_previous_undeleted(shared->mailbox, index);
2121  if (newidx >= 0)
2122  e = mutt_get_virt_email(shared->mailbox, newidx);
2123  }
2124 
2125  enum MxStatus check = mx_mbox_sync(shared->mailbox);
2126  if (check == MX_STATUS_OK)
2127  {
2128  if (e && (shared->mailbox->vcount != ovc))
2129  {
2130  for (size_t i = 0; i < shared->mailbox->vcount; i++)
2131  {
2132  struct Email *e2 = mutt_get_virt_email(shared->mailbox, i);
2133  if (e2 == e)
2134  {
2135  menu_set_index(priv->menu, i);
2136  break;
2137  }
2138  }
2139  }
2140  OptSearchInvalid = true;
2141  }
2142  else if ((check == MX_STATUS_NEW_MAIL) || (check == MX_STATUS_REOPENED))
2143  {
2144  update_index(priv->menu, shared->ctx, check, oc, shared);
2145  }
2146 
2147  /* do a sanity check even if mx_mbox_sync failed. */
2148 
2149  index = menu_get_index(priv->menu);
2150  if ((index < 0) || (shared->mailbox && (index >= shared->mailbox->vcount)))
2151  {
2152  menu_set_index(priv->menu, ci_first_message(shared->mailbox));
2153  }
2154  }
2155 
2156  /* check for a fatal error, or all messages deleted */
2157  if (shared->mailbox && mutt_buffer_is_empty(&shared->mailbox->pathbuf))
2158  {
2159  ctx_free(&shared->ctx);
2160  }
2161 
2162  /* if we were in the pager, redisplay the message */
2163  if (priv->in_pager)
2164  {
2165  op = OP_DISPLAY_MESSAGE;
2166  continue;
2167  }
2168  else
2169  menu_queue_redraw(priv->menu, MENU_REDRAW_FULL);
2170  break;
2171 
2172  case OP_MAIN_QUASI_DELETE:
2173  if (!prereq(shared->ctx, priv->menu, CHECK_IN_MAILBOX | CHECK_MSGCOUNT | CHECK_VISIBLE))
2174  break;
2175  if (priv->tag)
2176  {
2177  struct Mailbox *m = shared->mailbox;
2178  for (size_t i = 0; i < m->msg_count; i++)
2179  {
2180  struct Email *e = m->emails[i];
2181  if (!e)
2182  break;
2183  if (message_is_tagged(e))
2184  {
2185  e->quasi_deleted = true;
2186  m->changed = true;
2187  }
2188  }
2189  }
2190  else
2191  {
2192  if (!shared->email)
2193  break;
2194  shared->email->quasi_deleted = true;
2195  shared->mailbox->changed = true;
2196  }
2197  break;
2198 
2199 #ifdef USE_NOTMUCH
2200  case OP_MAIN_ENTIRE_THREAD:
2201  {
2202  if (!prereq(shared->ctx, priv->menu, CHECK_IN_MAILBOX | CHECK_MSGCOUNT | CHECK_VISIBLE))
2203  break;
2204  char buf[PATH_MAX] = { 0 };
2205  if (shared->mailbox->type != MUTT_NOTMUCH)
2206  {
2207  if (((shared->mailbox->type != MUTT_MH) && (shared->mailbox->type != MUTT_MAILDIR)) ||
2208  (!shared->email || !shared->email->env || !shared->email->env->message_id))
2209  {
2210  mutt_message(_("No virtual folder and no Message-Id, aborting"));
2211  break;
2212  } // no virtual folder, but we have message-id, reconstruct thread on-the-fly
2213  strncpy(buf, "id:", sizeof(buf));
2214  int msg_id_offset = 0;
2215  if ((shared->email->env->message_id)[0] == '<')
2216  msg_id_offset = 1;
2217  mutt_str_cat(buf, sizeof(buf), (shared->email->env->message_id) + msg_id_offset);
2218  if (buf[strlen(buf) - 1] == '>')
2219  buf[strlen(buf) - 1] = '\0';
2220 
2221  change_folder_notmuch(priv->menu, buf, sizeof(buf), &priv->oldcount, shared, false);
2222 
2223  // If notmuch doesn't contain the message, we're left in an empty
2224  // vfolder. No messages are found, but nm_read_entire_thread assumes
2225  // a valid message-id and will throw a segfault.
2226  //
2227  // To prevent that, stay in the empty vfolder and print an error.
2228  if (shared->mailbox->msg_count == 0)
2229  {
2230  mutt_error(_("failed to find message in notmuch database. try "
2231  "running 'notmuch new'."));
2232  break;
2233  }
2234  }
2235  priv->oldcount = shared->mailbox->msg_count;
2236  int index = menu_get_index(priv->menu);
2237  struct Email *e_oldcur = mutt_get_virt_email(shared->mailbox, index);
2238  if (nm_read_entire_thread(shared->mailbox, e_oldcur) < 0)
2239  {
2240  mutt_message(_("Failed to read thread, aborting"));
2241  break;
2242  }
2243  if (priv->oldcount < shared->mailbox->msg_count)
2244  {
2245  /* nm_read_entire_thread() triggers mutt_sort_headers() if necessary */
2246  index = e_oldcur->vnum;
2247  if (e_oldcur->collapsed || shared->ctx->collapsed)
2248  {
2249  index = mutt_uncollapse_thread(e_oldcur);
2250  mutt_set_vnum(shared->mailbox);
2251  }
2252  menu_set_index(priv->menu, index);
2253  menu_queue_redraw(priv->menu, MENU_REDRAW_STATUS | MENU_REDRAW_INDEX);
2254  }
2255  if (priv->in_pager)
2256  {
2257  op = OP_DISPLAY_MESSAGE;
2258  continue;
2259  }
2260  break;
2261  }
2262 #endif
2263 
2264  case OP_MAIN_MODIFY_TAGS:
2265  case OP_MAIN_MODIFY_TAGS_THEN_HIDE:
2266  {
2267  if (!shared->mailbox)
2268  break;
2269  struct Mailbox *m = shared->mailbox;
2270  if (!mx_tags_is_supported(m))
2271  {
2272  mutt_message(_("Folder doesn't support tagging, aborting"));
2273  break;
2274  }
2275  if (!prereq(shared->ctx, priv->menu,
2276  CHECK_IN_MAILBOX | CHECK_MSGCOUNT | CHECK_VISIBLE | CHECK_READONLY))
2277  {
2278  break;
2279  }
2280  if (!shared->email)
2281  break;
2282  char *tags = NULL;
2283  if (!priv->tag)
2284  tags = driver_tags_get_with_hidden(&shared->email->tags);
2285  char buf[PATH_MAX] = { 0 };
2286  int rc = mx_tags_edit(m, tags, buf, sizeof(buf));
2287  FREE(&tags);
2288  if (rc < 0)
2289  break;
2290  else if (rc == 0)
2291  {
2292  mutt_message(_("No tag specified, aborting"));
2293  break;
2294  }
2295 
2296  if (priv->tag)
2297  {
2298  struct Progress *progress = NULL;
2299 
2300  if (m->verbose)
2301  {
2302  progress = progress_new(_("Update tags..."), MUTT_PROGRESS_WRITE, m->msg_tagged);
2303  }
2304 
2305 #ifdef USE_NOTMUCH
2306  if (m->type == MUTT_NOTMUCH)
2307  nm_db_longrun_init(m, true);
2308 #endif
2309  for (int px = 0, i = 0; i < m->msg_count; i++)
2310  {
2311  struct Email *e = m->emails[i];
2312  if (!e)
2313  break;
2314  if (!message_is_tagged(e))
2315  continue;
2316 
2317  if (m->verbose)
2318  progress_update(progress, ++px, -1);
2319  mx_tags_commit(m, e, buf);
2320  if (op == OP_MAIN_MODIFY_TAGS_THEN_HIDE)
2321  {
2322  bool still_queried = false;
2323 #ifdef USE_NOTMUCH
2324  if (m->type == MUTT_NOTMUCH)
2325  still_queried = nm_message_is_still_queried(m, e);
2326 #endif
2327  e->quasi_deleted = !still_queried;
2328  m->changed = true;
2329  }
2330  }
2331  progress_free(&progress);
2332 #ifdef USE_NOTMUCH
2333  if (m->type == MUTT_NOTMUCH)
2334  nm_db_longrun_done(m);
2335 #endif
2336  menu_queue_redraw(priv->menu, MENU_REDRAW_STATUS | MENU_REDRAW_INDEX);
2337  }
2338  else
2339  {
2340  if (mx_tags_commit(m, shared->email, buf))
2341  {
2342  mutt_message(_("Failed to modify tags, aborting"));
2343  break;
2344  }
2345  if (op == OP_MAIN_MODIFY_TAGS_THEN_HIDE)
2346  {
2347  bool still_queried = false;
2348 #ifdef USE_NOTMUCH
2349  if (m->type == MUTT_NOTMUCH)
2350  still_queried = nm_message_is_still_queried(m, shared->email);
2351 #endif
2352  shared->email->quasi_deleted = !still_queried;
2353  m->changed = true;
2354  }
2355  if (priv->in_pager)
2356  {
2357  op = OP_DISPLAY_MESSAGE;
2358  continue;
2359  }
2360  const bool c_resolve = cs_subset_bool(shared->sub, "resolve");
2361  if (c_resolve)
2362  {
2363  int index = menu_get_index(priv->menu);
2364  index = ci_next_undeleted(shared->mailbox, index);
2365  if (index == -1)
2366  {
2367  menu_queue_redraw(priv->menu, MENU_REDRAW_CURRENT);
2368  }
2369  else
2370  {
2371  menu_set_index(priv->menu, index);
2372  }
2373  }
2374  else
2375  menu_queue_redraw(priv->menu, MENU_REDRAW_CURRENT);
2376  }
2377  menu_queue_redraw(priv->menu, MENU_REDRAW_STATUS);
2378  break;
2379  }
2380 
2381  case OP_CHECK_STATS:
2382  mutt_check_stats(shared->mailbox);
2383  break;
2384 
2385 #ifdef USE_NOTMUCH
2386  case OP_MAIN_VFOLDER_FROM_QUERY:
2387  case OP_MAIN_VFOLDER_FROM_QUERY_READONLY:
2388  {
2389  char buf[PATH_MAX] = { 0 };
2390  if ((mutt_get_field("Query: ", buf, sizeof(buf), MUTT_NM_QUERY, false, NULL, NULL) != 0) ||
2391  (buf[0] == '\0'))
2392  {
2393  mutt_message(_("No query, aborting"));
2394  break;
2395  }
2396 
2397  // Keep copy of user's query to name the mailbox
2398  char *query_unencoded = mutt_str_dup(buf);
2399 
2400  struct Mailbox *m_query =
2401  change_folder_notmuch(priv->menu, buf, sizeof(buf), &priv->oldcount, shared,
2402  (op == OP_MAIN_VFOLDER_FROM_QUERY_READONLY));
2403  if (m_query)
2404  {
2405  m_query->name = query_unencoded;
2406  query_unencoded = NULL;

2416  case OP_MAIN_WINDOWED_VFOLDER_BACKWARD:
2417  case OP_MAIN_WINDOWED_VFOLDER_FORWARD:
2418  case OP_MAIN_WINDOWED_VFOLDER_RESET:
2419  {

2421  if (!prereq(shared->ctx, priv->menu, CHECK_IN_MAILBOX))
2422  break;

2424  {
2425  mutt_message(_("Windowed queries disabled"));
2426  break;
2427  }
2428  const char *const c_nm_query_window_current_search =
2429  cs_subset_string(shared->sub, "nm_query_window_current_search");
2430  if (!c_nm_query_window_current_search)
2431  {
2432  mutt_message(_("No notmuch vfolder currently loaded"));
2433  break;
2434  }
2435

2437  switch (op)
2438  {
2439  case OP_MAIN_WINDOWED_VFOLDER_BACKWARD:
2440  nm_query_window_backward();
2441  break;
2442  case OP_MAIN_WINDOWED_VFOLDER_FORWARD:
2443  nm_query_window_forward();
2444  break;
2445  case OP_MAIN_WINDOWED_VFOLDER_RESET:
2446  nm_query_window_reset();
2447  break;
2448  }
2449 
2450  // Common query window folder change.
2451  char buf[PATH_MAX] = { 0 };
2452  mutt_str_copy(buf, c_nm_query_window_current_search, sizeof(buf));
2453  change_folder_notmuch(priv->menu, buf, sizeof(buf), &priv->oldcount, shared, false);
2454  break;
2455  }
2456 #endif
2457 
2458 #ifdef USE_SIDEBAR
2459  case OP_SIDEBAR_OPEN:
2460  {
2461  struct MuttWindow *win_sidebar = window_find_child(dlg, WT_SIDEBAR);
2462  change_folder_mailbox(priv->menu, sb_get_highlight(win_sidebar),
2463  &priv->oldcount, shared, false);
2464  break;
2465  }
2466 #endif
2467 
2468  case OP_MAIN_NEXT_UNREAD_MAILBOX:
2469  {
2470  if (!prereq(shared->ctx, priv->menu, CHECK_IN_MAILBOX))
2471  break;
2472 
2473  struct Mailbox *m = shared->mailbox;
2474 
2475  struct Buffer *folderbuf = mutt_buffer_pool_get();
2476  mutt_buffer_strcpy(folderbuf, mailbox_path(m));
2477  m = mutt_mailbox_next(m, folderbuf);
2478  mutt_buffer_pool_release(&folderbuf);
2479 
2480  if (!m)
2481  {
2482  mutt_error(_("No mailboxes have new mail"));
2483  break;
2484  }
2485 
2486  change_folder_mailbox(priv->menu, m, &priv->oldcount, shared, false);
2487  break;
2488  }
2489 
2490  case OP_MAIN_CHANGE_FOLDER:
2491  case OP_MAIN_CHANGE_FOLDER_READONLY:
2492 #ifdef USE_NOTMUCH
2493  case OP_MAIN_CHANGE_VFOLDER: // now an alias for OP_MAIN_CHANGE_FOLDER
2494 #endif
2495  {
2496  bool pager_return = true; /* return to display message in pager */
2497  struct Buffer *folderbuf = mutt_buffer_pool_get();
2498  mutt_buffer_alloc(folderbuf, PATH_MAX);
2499 
2500  char *cp = NULL;
2501  bool read_only;
2502  const bool c_read_only = cs_subset_bool(shared->sub, "read_only");
2503  if (priv->attach_msg || c_read_only || (op == OP_MAIN_CHANGE_FOLDER_READONLY))
2504  {
2505  cp = _("Open mailbox in read-only mode");
2506  read_only = true;
2507  }
2508  else
2509  {
2510  cp = _("Open mailbox");
2511  read_only = false;
2512  }
2513 
2514  const bool c_change_folder_next =
2515  cs_subset_bool(shared->sub, "change_folder_next");
2516  if (c_change_folder_next && shared->mailbox &&
2517  !mutt_buffer_is_empty(&shared->mailbox->pathbuf))
2518  {
2519  mutt_buffer_strcpy(folderbuf, mailbox_path(shared->mailbox));
2520  mutt_buffer_pretty_mailbox(folderbuf);
2521  }
2522  /* By default, fill buf with the next mailbox that contains unread mail */
2523  mutt_mailbox_next(shared->ctx ? shared->mailbox : NULL, folderbuf);
2524 
2525  if (mutt_buffer_enter_fname(cp, folderbuf, true, shared->mailbox, false,
2526  NULL, NULL, MUTT_SEL_NO_FLAGS) == -1)
2527  goto changefoldercleanup;
2528 
2529  /* Selected directory is okay, let's save it. */
2530  mutt_browser_select_dir(mutt_buffer_string(folderbuf));
2531 
2532  if (mutt_buffer_is_empty(folderbuf))
2533  {
2534  msgwin_clear_text();
2535  goto changefoldercleanup;
2536  }
2537 
2538  struct Mailbox *m = mx_mbox_find2(mutt_buffer_string(folderbuf));
2539  if (m)
2540  {
2541  change_folder_mailbox(priv->menu, m, &priv->oldcount, shared, read_only);
2542  pager_return = false;
2543  }
2544  else
2545  {
2546  change_folder_string(priv->menu, folderbuf->data, folderbuf->dsize,
2547  &priv->oldcount, shared, &pager_return, read_only);
2548  }
2549 
2550  changefoldercleanup:
2551  mutt_buffer_pool_release(&folderbuf);
2552  if (priv->in_pager && pager_return)
2553  {
2554  op = OP_DISPLAY_MESSAGE;
2555  continue;
2556  }
2557  menu_queue_redraw(priv->menu, MENU_REDRAW_FULL);
2558  break;
2559  }
2560 
2561 #ifdef USE_NNTP
2562  case OP_MAIN_CHANGE_GROUP:
2563  case OP_MAIN_CHANGE_GROUP_READONLY:
2564  {
2565  bool pager_return = true; /* return to display message in pager */
2566  struct Buffer *folderbuf = mutt_buffer_pool_get();
2567  mutt_buffer_alloc(folderbuf, PATH_MAX);

2569  OptNews = false;

2627 
2628  changefoldercleanup2:
2629  mutt_buffer_pool_release(&folderbuf);
2630  if (priv->in_pager && pager_return)
2631  {
2632  op = OP_DISPLAY_MESSAGE;
2633  continue;
2634  }
2635  break;
2636  }
2637 #endif
2638 
2639  case OP_DISPLAY_MESSAGE:
2640  case OP_DISPLAY_HEADERS: /* don't weed the headers */
2641  {
2642  if (!prereq(shared->ctx, priv->menu, CHECK_IN_MAILBOX | CHECK_MSGCOUNT | CHECK_VISIBLE))
2643  break;
2644  if (!shared->email)
2645  break;
2646  /* toggle the weeding of headers so that a user can press the key
2647  * again while reading the message. */
2648  if (op == OP_DISPLAY_HEADERS)
2649  bool_str_toggle(shared->sub, "weed", NULL);
2650 
2651  OptNeedResort = false;
2652 
2653  const short c_sort = cs_subset_sort(shared->sub, "sort");
2654  if (((c_sort & SORT_MASK) == SORT_THREADS) && shared->email->collapsed)
2655  {
2656  mutt_uncollapse_thread(shared->email);
2657  mutt_set_vnum(shared->mailbox);
2658  const bool c_uncollapse_jump =
2659  cs_subset_bool(shared->sub, "uncollapse_jump");
2660  if (c_uncollapse_jump)
2661  menu_set_index(priv->menu, mutt_thread_next_unread(shared->email));
2662  }
2663 
2664  const bool c_pgp_auto_decode =
2665  cs_subset_bool(shared->sub, "pgp_auto_decode");
2666  if (c_pgp_auto_decode &&
2667  (priv->tag || !(shared->email->security & PGP_TRADITIONAL_CHECKED)))
2668  {
2669  struct EmailList el = STAILQ_HEAD_INITIALIZER(el);
2670  el_add_tagged(&el, shared->ctx, shared->email, priv->tag);
2671  if (mutt_check_traditional_pgp(shared->mailbox, &el))
2672  menu_queue_redraw(priv->menu, MENU_REDRAW_FULL);
2673  emaillist_clear(&el);
2674  }
2675  const int index = menu_get_index(priv->menu);
2676  index_shared_data_set_email(shared, mutt_get_virt_email(shared->mailbox, index));
2677 
2678  op = mutt_display_message(priv->win_index, priv->win_ibar, priv->win_pager,
2679  priv->win_pbar, shared->mailbox, shared->email);
2680  window_set_focus(priv->win_index);
2681  if (op < 0)
2682  {
2683  OptNeedResort = false;
2684  break;
2685  }
2686 
2687  /* This is used to redirect a single operation back here afterwards. If
2688  * mutt_display_message() returns 0, then this flag and pager state will
2689  * be cleaned up after this switch statement. */
2690  priv->in_pager = true;
2691  if (shared->mailbox)
2692  {
2693  update_index(priv->menu, shared->ctx, MX_STATUS_NEW_MAIL,
2694  shared->mailbox->msg_count, shared);
2695  }
2696  continue;
2697  }
2698 
2699  case OP_EXIT:
2700  if ((!priv->in_pager) && priv->attach_msg)
2701  {
2702  priv->done = true;
2703  break;
2704  }
2705 
2706  const enum QuadOption c_quit = cs_subset_quad(shared->sub, "quit");
2707  if ((!priv->in_pager) &&
2708  (query_quadoption(c_quit, _("Exit NeoMutt without saving?")) == MUTT_YES))
2709  {
2710  if (shared->ctx)
2711  {
2712  mx_fastclose_mailbox(shared->mailbox);
2713  ctx_free(&shared->ctx);
2714  }
2715  priv->done = true;
2716  }
2717  break;
2718 
2719  case OP_MAIN_BREAK_THREAD:
2720  {
2721  if (!prereq(shared->ctx, priv->menu,
2722  CHECK_IN_MAILBOX | CHECK_MSGCOUNT | CHECK_VISIBLE | CHECK_READONLY))
2723  {
2724  break;
2725  }
2726  /* L10N: CHECK_ACL */
2727  if (!check_acl(shared->mailbox, MUTT_ACL_WRITE, _("Can't break thread")))
2728  break;
2729  if (!shared->email)
2730  break;
2731 
2732  const short c_sort = cs_subset_sort(shared->sub, "sort");
2733  if ((c_sort & SORT_MASK) != SORT_THREADS)
2734  mutt_error(_("Threading is not enabled"));
2735  else if (!STAILQ_EMPTY(&shared->email->env->in_reply_to) ||
2736  !STAILQ_EMPTY(&shared->email->env->references))
2737  {
2738  {
2739  mutt_break_thread(shared->email);
2740  mutt_sort_headers(shared->mailbox, shared->ctx->threads, true,
2741  &shared->ctx->vsize);
2742  menu_set_index(priv->menu, shared->email->vnum);
2743  }
2744 
2745  shared->mailbox->changed = true;
2746  mutt_message(_("Thread broken"));
2747 
2748  if (priv->in_pager)
2749  {
2750  op = OP_DISPLAY_MESSAGE;
2751  continue;
2752  }
2753  else
2754  menu_queue_redraw(priv->menu, MENU_REDRAW_INDEX);
2755  }
2756  else
2757  {
2758  mutt_error(
2759  _("Thread can't be broken, message is not part of a thread"));
2760  }
2761  break;
2762  }
2763 
2764  case OP_MAIN_LINK_THREADS:
2765  {
2766  if (!prereq(shared->ctx, priv->menu,
2767  CHECK_IN_MAILBOX | CHECK_MSGCOUNT | CHECK_VISIBLE | CHECK_READONLY))
2768  {
2769  break;
2770  }
2771  /* L10N: CHECK_ACL */
2772  if (!check_acl(shared->mailbox, MUTT_ACL_WRITE, _("Can't link threads")))
2773  break;
2774  if (!shared->email)
2775  break;
2776 
2777  const short c_sort = cs_subset_sort(shared->sub, "sort");
2778  if ((c_sort & SORT_MASK) != SORT_THREADS)
2779  mutt_error(_("Threading is not enabled"));
2780  else if (!shared->email->env->message_id)
2781  mutt_error(_("No Message-ID: header available to link thread"));
2782  else
2783  {
2784  struct EmailList el = STAILQ_HEAD_INITIALIZER(el);
2785  el_add_tagged(&el, shared->ctx, NULL, true);

3999  menu_queue_redraw(priv->menu, MENU_REDRAW_FULL);
4000  break;
4001  }
4002  }
4003 #endif
4004  /* fallthrough */
4005  case OP_REPLY:
4006  {
4007  if (!prereq(shared->ctx, priv->menu,
4008  CHECK_IN_MAILBOX | CHECK_MSGCOUNT | CHECK_VISIBLE | CHECK_ATTACH))
4009  {
4010  break;
4011  }
4012  if (!shared->email)
4013  break;
4014  struct EmailList el = STAILQ_HEAD_INITIALIZER(el);
4015  el_add_tagged(&el, shared->ctx, shared->email, priv->tag);
4016  const bool c_pgp_auto_decode =
4017  cs_subset_bool(shared->sub, "pgp_auto_decode");
4018  if (c_pgp_auto_decode &&
4019  (priv->tag || !(shared->email->security & PGP_TRADITIONAL_CHECKED)))
4020  {
4021  if (mutt_check_traditional_pgp(shared->mailbox, &el))
4022  menu_queue_redraw(priv->menu, MENU_REDRAW_FULL);
4023  }
4024  mutt_send_message(SEND_REPLY, NULL, NULL, shared->mailbox, &el, shared->sub);
4025  emaillist_clear(&el);
4026  menu_queue_redraw(priv->menu, MENU_REDRAW_FULL);
4027  break;
4028  }
4029 
4030  case OP_SHELL_ESCAPE:
4031  if (mutt_shell_escape())
4032  {
4033  mutt_mailbox_check(shared->mailbox, MUTT_MAILBOX_CHECK_FORCE);
4034  }
4035  break;
4036 
4037  case OP_TAG_THREAD:
4038  case OP_TAG_SUBTHREAD:
4039  {
4040  if (!prereq(shared->ctx, priv->menu, CHECK_IN_MAILBOX | CHECK_MSGCOUNT | CHECK_VISIBLE))
4041  break;
4042  if (!shared->email)
4043  break;
4044 
4045  int rc = mutt_thread_set_flag(shared->mailbox, shared->email, MUTT_TAG,
4046  !shared->email->tagged, (op != OP_TAG_THREAD));
4047  if (rc != -1)
4048  {
4049  const bool c_resolve = cs_subset_bool(shared->sub, "resolve");
4050  if (c_resolve)
4051  {
4052  int index;
4053  if (op == OP_TAG_THREAD)
4054  index = mutt_next_thread(shared->email);
4055  else
4056  index = mutt_next_subthread(shared->email);
4057 
4058  if (index != -1)
4059  menu_set_index(priv->menu, index);
4060  }
4061  menu_queue_redraw(priv->menu, MENU_REDRAW_INDEX | MENU_REDRAW_STATUS);
4062  }
4063  break;
4064  }
4065 
4066  case OP_UNDELETE:
4067  {
4068  if (!prereq(shared->ctx, priv->menu,
4069  CHECK_IN_MAILBOX | CHECK_MSGCOUNT | CHECK_VISIBLE | CHECK_READONLY))
4070  {
4071  break;
4072  }
4073  /* L10N: CHECK_ACL */
4074  if (!check_acl(shared->mailbox, MUTT_ACL_DELETE, _("Can't undelete message")))
4075  break;
4076 
4077  struct EmailList el = STAILQ_HEAD_INITIALIZER(el);
4078  el_add_tagged(&el, shared->ctx, shared->email, priv->tag);
4079 
4080  mutt_emails_set_flag(shared->mailbox, &el, MUTT_DELETE, false);
4081  mutt_emails_set_flag(shared->mailbox, &el, MUTT_PURGE, false);
4082  emaillist_clear(&el);
4083 
4084  if (priv->tag)
4085  {
4086  menu_queue_redraw(priv->menu, MENU_REDRAW_INDEX);
4087  }
4088  else
4089  {
4090  const bool c_resolve = cs_subset_bool(shared->sub, "resolve");
4091  const int index = menu_get_index(priv->menu) + 1;
4092  if (c_resolve && (index < shared->mailbox->vcount))
4093  {
4094  menu_set_index(priv->menu, index);
4095  }
4096  else
4097  menu_queue_redraw(priv->menu, MENU_REDRAW_CURRENT);
4098  }
4099 
4100  menu_queue_redraw(priv->menu, MENU_REDRAW_STATUS);
4101  break;
4102  }
4103 
4104  case OP_UNDELETE_THREAD:
4105  case OP_UNDELETE_SUBTHREAD:
4106  {
4107  if (!prereq(shared->ctx, priv->menu,
4108  CHECK_IN_MAILBOX | CHECK_MSGCOUNT | CHECK_VISIBLE | CHECK_READONLY))
4109  {
4110  break;
4111  }
4112  /* L10N: CHECK_ACL */
4113  /* L10N: Due to the implementation details we do not know whether we
4114  undelete zero, 1, 12, ... messages. So in English we use
4115  "messages". Your language might have other means to express this. */
4116  if (!check_acl(shared->mailbox, MUTT_ACL_DELETE, _("Can't undelete messages")))
4117  break;
4118 
4119  int rc = mutt_thread_set_flag(shared->mailbox, shared->email, MUTT_DELETE,
4120  false, (op != OP_UNDELETE_THREAD));
4121  if (rc != -1)
4122  {
4123  rc = mutt_thread_set_flag(shared->mailbox, shared->email, MUTT_PURGE,
4124  false, (op != OP_UNDELETE_THREAD));
4125  }
4126  if (rc != -1)
4127  {
4128  const bool c_resolve = cs_subset_bool(shared->sub, "resolve");
4129  if (c_resolve)
4130  {
4131  int index;
4132  if (op == OP_UNDELETE_THREAD)
4133  index = mutt_next_thread(shared->email);
4134  else
4135  index = mutt_next_subthread(shared->email);
4136 
4137  if (index != -1)
4138  menu_set_index(priv->menu, index);
4139  }
4140  menu_queue_redraw(priv->menu, MENU_REDRAW_INDEX | MENU_REDRAW_STATUS);
4141  }
4142  break;
4143  }
4144 
4145  case OP_VERSION:
4146  mutt_message(mutt_make_version());
4147  break;
4148 
4149  case OP_MAILBOX_LIST:
4150  mutt_mailbox_list();
4151  break;
4152 
4153  case OP_VIEW_ATTACHMENTS:
4154  {
4155  if (!prereq(shared->ctx, priv->menu, CHECK_IN_MAILBOX | CHECK_MSGCOUNT | CHECK_VISIBLE))
4156  break;
4157  if (!shared->email)
4158  break;
4159  struct Message *msg = mx_msg_open(shared->mailbox, shared->email->msgno);
4160  if (msg)
4161  {
4162  dlg_select_attachment(NeoMutt->sub, shared->mailbox, shared->email, msg->fp);
4163  if (shared->email->attach_del)
4164  {
4165  shared->mailbox->changed = true;
4166  }
4167  mx_msg_close(shared->mailbox, &msg);
4168  }
4169  menu_queue_redraw(priv->menu, MENU_REDRAW_FULL);
4170  break;
4171  }
4172 
4173  case OP_END_COND:
4174  break;
4175 
4176  case OP_WHAT_KEY:
4177  mutt_what_key();
4178  break;
4179 
4180 #ifdef USE_SIDEBAR
4181  case OP_SIDEBAR_FIRST:
4182  case OP_SIDEBAR_LAST:
4183  case OP_SIDEBAR_NEXT:
4184  case OP_SIDEBAR_NEXT_NEW:
4185  case OP_SIDEBAR_PAGE_DOWN:
4186  case OP_SIDEBAR_PAGE_UP:
4187  case OP_SIDEBAR_PREV:
4188  case OP_SIDEBAR_PREV_NEW:
4189  {
4190  struct MuttWindow *win_sidebar = window_find_child(dlg, WT_SIDEBAR);
4191  if (!win_sidebar)
4192  break;
4193  sb_change_mailbox(win_sidebar, op);
4194  break;
4195  }
4196 
4197  case OP_SIDEBAR_TOGGLE_VISIBLE:
4198  bool_str_toggle(shared->sub, "sidebar_visible", NULL);
4199  mutt_window_reflow(NULL);
4200  break;
4201 #endif
4202 
4203 #ifdef USE_AUTOCRYPT
4204  case OP_AUTOCRYPT_ACCT_MENU:
4205  dlg_select_autocrypt_account(shared->mailbox);
4206  break;
4207 #endif
4208 
4209  default:
4210  if (!priv->in_pager)
4211  km_error_key(MENU_MAIN);
4212  }
4213 
4214 #ifdef USE_NOTMUCH
4215  nm_db_debug_check(shared->mailbox);
4216 #endif
4217 
4218  if (priv->in_pager)
4219  {
4220  mutt_clear_pager_position();
4221  priv->in_pager = false;
4222  menu_queue_redraw(priv->menu, MENU_REDRAW_FULL);
4223  }
4224 
4225  if (priv->done)
4226  break;
4227  }
4228 
4229  ctx_free(&shared->ctx);
4230  Context = ctx_old;
4231 
4232  return shared->mailbox;
4233 }

4240 void mutt_set_header_color(struct Mailbox *m, struct Email *e)
4241 {
4242  if (!e)
4243  return;
4244

4251  MUTT_MATCH_FULL_ADDRESS, m, e, &cache))
4252  {
4253  e->pair = color->pair;
4254  return;
4255  }
4256  }
4257  e->pair = mutt_color(MT_COLOR_NORMAL);
4258 }
